message.entry: Dimensionality of specified geometric transformation must match dimensionality of {0}.
{0} property of spatial referencing object {1} does not agree with size of input image {2}.
The number of dimensions of the input image {0} must be 3 when the specified geometric transformation is 3-D.
{0} must be scalar except when a 2-D geometric transform is applied to a stack of 2-D images.
When {0} is an N dimensional array, the size of {1} must match dimensions 3 to N of the input {2}.
Invalid FillValue. Categorical inputs only support the default FillValue of '0', corresponding to the 'undefined' label.
gpuArray image must be uint8, uint16, uint32, int8, int16, int32, single, double, or logical.
You specified a 3-D spatial referencing object. Only 2-D image warping is supported for gpuArray image.
You specified a 3-D geometric transformation. Only 2-D image warping is supported for gpuArray image.
You specified a projective2d geometric transformation. Only affine2d geometric transformations are supported for gpuArray image.

You called IMWARP such that the number of rows or columns in the output image is less than 3. For gpuArray input image, IMWARP requires the number of rows and columns in the output image to be greater than or equal to 3. Consider changing the size of the input image or specifying a spatial referencing object for the 'OutputView' parameter to change the output image size.
You specified a 3-D spatial referencing object for 'OutputView'. Only 2-D spatial referencing objects can be specified for 'OutputView' for gpuArray image.
Value for 'OutputView' must be a valid spatial referencing object.
Interpolation method must be a string or a character vector constant.
Value for 'OutputView' must be a valid spatial referencing object.
Value for 'OutputView' must be specified if dynamic memory allocation is turned off.
When D is 3-D displacement field of size MxNxPx3, input image A must be 3-D.
Displacement field D must be of size MxNx2 or MxNxPx3.
Spatial referencing arguments not supported when warping with displacement field.
Invalid METHOD. METHOD must be 'nearest' for categorical inputs.
The 'SmoothEdges' Name/Value is not supported for gpuArray inputs.
Cubic interpolation is not supported for gpuArray inputs.
For gpuArray inputs only translation, rigid, similarity, affine, projective, and displacement field geometric transformations are supported.
